description: From the outside this house looks very elegant. It has been built with walnut wood and has mahogany wooden decorations. Large, octagon windows add to the overall style of the house and have been added to the house in a mostly symmetric way.
This house is located in a quiet area and has been recently renovated. The house has been recently painted and has a nice exterior view.

This house is located in the heart of the city and is very close to the subway. It is a large, two bedroom, two bath house with a large living room, a kitchen, a dining room, a library and a large backyard.
The house is equipped with a modern kitchen and one large bathroom, it also has a small living room, two bedrooms, a roomy dining room.
The house is equipped with a modern kitchen and one large bathroom, it also has a small living room, two bedrooms, a roomy dining room, a library and a cozy basement.
This house is one of the most popular houses with everything you need in one place. It is a large, three bedroom, three bath house with a large living room, a kitchen, a dining room, a library.
